The Chibi Goddess starts talking again. "You will use these abilities to Hop and Bop your way to the end of the stage. A boss will be located there, defeat that and you'll be sent to the next stage. Pretty simple right? But be careful, at this size and with the Goddess' magic anything and everything could become a threat." she says as she disappears.

You sigh, guess you have no choice but to play along with the Goddess' game for now.
15533222212221.title: Green Garden Zone Part 1

155332222122211.content:
You begin to walk down the path laid out for you by the Goddess. You stay vigilant, a little shaken up by the Chibi Goddess' warning. What did she mean by anything could be a threat? Is the grass going to start attacking you? After thinking about that for a second you laugh it off, no way that could happen. How would it even attack, would it fall over on you? Suddenly you hear a sound from the grass. You get serious again, you can make all the jokes you want but she probably wasn't exaggerating. You hear the sound again and though you're not really sure how to describe it you know it's definitely a bug of some sort. You gulp, this is not going be fun. Suddenly an ant comes from the grass and blocks your progress. You size it up. At the very least it's not bigger than you. You're able to stare at it eye to freaky compound eye. Those mandibles look like they could slice you into bits in a second and it generally just looks really intimidating.

You take a deep breath and remember the punching bag. Sure in real life if you were the size of an ant then the ant would win, they're bred to survive and have a super tough exoskeleton while you don't but this is a video game. You have extra strength and abilities you couldn't hope to posses in the real world. The ant has no way to defend itself from an aerial attack, so just jump on it like you're Mario clearing out a horde of goombas. You jump up in the air and the ant can't even look up as fall back down and slam onto it's back. It cries out in pain. Just like you were if you were in a video game the moment the damage is done you're sent back up in the air. You do a back flip and land in the same spot you jumped from. You kinda messed up the landing though and ended up falling onto one knee. Heh, stupid ant didn't even stand a chance. You look back up and receive the shock of your life. The ant isn't dead, it's damaged yes but it's definitely not dead. Before you can react the ant rushes you, it's mandibles wrap around your waist. Surprisingly you're not dead, it hurts like a bitch but you would've assumed you would've been bitcheroni by now. Guess it's more of that video game logic (sharp objects don't actually cut anything, they just do damage) benefiting you. But if that's the case then you probably have a health bar of some sort, you better put an end to this before that depletes. You don't want to see what happens if you get a game over. You slam both of your fists down onto the beasts head and the mandibles let go of you, then you jump back up into the air and slam down onto the same spot as last time. This time it has the intended effect and you feel the ant disappear from beneath you.

You look around to see if there are any other challengers and all you see is another one of those question marks. You walk up to it and touch it before taking a seat, you figure you might as well take a breather while you listen to your living tutorial. Once again it transforms into a miniature version of the Goddess. Chibi Goddess takes a quick look at you. "Oh my, you don't look so good. Hopefully you don't end up looking like that after every battle because they're only going to get harder and more numerous from here on." Chibi Goddess explains. 'Of course they are, it's a video game.' you think to yourself. "However I think now would be a good time to give you your first healing item." The Chibi Goddess says while spawning a 2d looking heart in front of you. "There's nothing complex here, hearts heal you, make sure you don't lose all your health, etc. etc." she continues to explain while you touch the 2d heart. The moment you touch it it disappears and your wounds and clothes repair themselves. "No need to thank me." The chibi Goddess says with a wink as she disappears again.

You sigh and pick yourself up off the ground. Now that you're healed up it's time to keep moving forward. You continue down the path and encounter your first platforming challenge. At the end of your path was a long flower stalk with multiple leaves jetting out from it. You noticed that the leaves were in a spiral formation. Probably something invented for the game, I doubt any flower does that. You jump onto the first leaf, it;s surprisingly solid. It's either more video game logic helping you or the fact that you're so small that you're weight can't even make these leaves budge, you really hope it's not the second one. You jump up the spiral leaf stair case and when you make it to the top you realize it's a sunflower, only with the actual flower part being vertical so that you can use it as a platform. You look around realize just how high up you are. You read once that Sunflowers usually reach up to 9 feet tall, some can even reach 16 feet tall. So needless to say looking off to the side does nothing but give you vertigo. Granted the Goddess probably made it a lot shorter for you to be able to actually get to the top but still. Suddenly you hear a sound that scares you to the bone. A monotone buzzing sound comes from above you. As you look up you see a huge black and yellow object descending upon the platform you're on. It's a honey bee...it must be at least twenty times bigger than you (I'm not exaggerating that by the way, 1/16th of an inch tall is about a milimeter and a queen honey bee can grow up to 20 milimeters tall). You gulp and take a step back as a shockwave only felt by you goes through the Sunflower as the Queen Bee lands. Jesus, even it's head is bigger than you. Does she really expect you to fight THAT?! "I don't expect you to fight it, I expect you to ride it." the Goddess' voice echoes from all around, it's like she's everywhere at once. You have to cover your ears to stop from going deaf.

Did she say ride it. You sigh, well it's probably not the craziest thing you'll have to do by the time the day is through. You run up the 100 foot tall bee and put your jumping skills to the test. Luckily for you it seems like the Sunflower was magically enhanced to make you jump higher. You land on the creatures back without any trouble. The thing doesn't even feel you but it does take off flying after you get secured. You don't even have to hold on, the Goddess must be protecting you from the wind and velocity. Eventually the bee lands at it's destination. From your perspective it's a barren wasteland, to regular sized people it's a small flower bed that's currently empty. After you jump off the queen bee (thank god fall damage isn't a thing in this game) it flies off, the winds produced by it's wings blowing you back a little. As you pick yourself up the alarm bells in your head start ringing. ...That's not a figure of speech, an actual alarm was ringing in your head. Over the alarm you can hear a voice in your head saying "Giantess encounter".

A huge sandal slams in front of you. When did they get here, you know she wasn't around a second ago. Oh right, video game. The probably only appeared now because of pop-up. You look up to see if you recognize the person but all you can see is tan flesh heading towards you. You run and dive out of the way of the giant fleshy colored meteor. You look to your left and right and see two gigantic knees on either side of you. You stand back up to face your unwitting assassin. You see that it's definitely a women and that they're wearing a generic sun dress, you look up at her face but you can't really see it all that well since her Sun hat was casting her face in shadow.

"Ah, nothing like planting a new flower in the summer." the Giantess states. Wait a minute, you recognize that voice! It's that stupid nerdy girl Stephanie, of course someone as lame as her would be into planting flowers. Stephanie picks up her handheld shovel and digs it into the ground, only a few feet away (from your perspective) from crushing you. Before you can get out of the way the ground below you starts to lift up. The dirt begins to get displaced and you're buried in dirt from the waist down. You get a feeling of vertigo as the shovel is lifted higher and higher. To her it was just a couple of inches but that's really high up for someone barely a milometer tall.If you don't get out of this soon you'll be buried alive. You try to push yourself upward, it actually works. Suddenly you're standing on top of the dirt again. You jump off the hand held shovel before she tilts all the dirt off of it. You land near the hole. As you turn around you see a seed double your height fall down into the hole. You back away from the hole and watch as Stephanie pours the dirt back into the hole and waters it. After that she stands up and walks away.

"Is...is that the end of the level? Did I survive the boss?" you ask out loud to no one in particular. "No you silly little thing, the boss fight starts now!" The Goddess' echoes from everywhere again. You see a glowing light from the hole that Stephanie just covered and suddenly something bursts from the ground! You look up and up and see a rose bigger than a redwood tree looming over you. Your whole body starts shaking, how the hell can I fight that?! You turn the other way and try to run but suddenly some of it's roots come out of the ground, blocking your path. You stop yourself before you run into them, a good thing too because it's true that every rose has it's thorns and these thorns could impale you easily. You turn back around to the rose and watch as two thorny vines begin to jet out from it's stem. How the hell am I supposed to fight that?! As if to answer your prayers the Chibi Goddess appears before you again. Before you can say anything she suddenly snaps her fingers and says: "Time for a size change!"

Your vision goes blurry for a second and when it returns you see that you're bigger than you were before. The Rose is still bigger than you but you're only half it's size as opposed to before when it was bigger than most skyscrapers. You also notice that there's a hatchet in your hand, time for some weedwacking!
155332222122211.title: Green Garden Zone Part 2

choices: A wonderland made entirely of giant candy and sweets.
1553322221222111.content:
"So I suppose you like the new arrangements?" The Chibi Goddess asks. In response you grip the hatchet tighter. "Just defeat this guy and you'll be done with Level 1, good luck!" she says as she disappears. So obviously in order to take this thing down you have to cut it down to size. Seems simple enough. You charge at it's main stem and immediately get slammed to the ground by one of it's tentacles. You roll out of the way as the same tentacle tries to slam on top of you while you were on the ground. You stand back up in a hurry. Alright, looks like you'll need to take care of those "arms" of his first. The tentacles rush at you. You dodge their lunges One of them starts sliding along the ground, trying to sweep your legs out from under you. You do a back flip over it, landing right behind it. Before it can raise back into the air you cut it in half with the hatchet. One down, one to go. The Rose seems to scream out in pain.

The remaining tentacle retreats and dives into the ground. Damnit, it could appear anywhere now.You feel the ground underneath you begin to give way and jump out of the way just as the tentacle burst out from where you were just standing. Just as quick as it appeared it disappeared back into the ground. It appears where you were standing again and you dodge it. You do this for a bit and you gradually get more and more tired. You dodge another of the tentacles strikes and begin to wait for the next one. You hear something behind you and you turn around just as the tentacle wraps around your upper body. It lifts you up in the air and starts squeezing the life out of you, quite literally. Your left arm is trapped but your right arm, aka the arm holding the hatchet is free. You quickly swing at the tentacle, hacking a sizeable portion of it off in the process. You fall to the ground and a dull ringing fills your head. As you stand up you realize that wasn't from the fall, it must be some sort of low health jingle because you can barely even stand at this point.

The Rose screams out in pain at this point and suddenly the stem becomes bright red. You start dodging as the main stem begins shooting thorns at all directions. As one grazes your ribs you realize that you have to fight ranged attacks with ranged attacks. You wait for a small lapse in the Roses attacks and when that opening comes you throw the hatchet horizontally, hoping it will slice right through the stem. You watch as the hatchet goes flying through the air and eventually it reaches it's target and does it's job beautifully. It's a clean slice and the Rose falls over, a sickening green liquid oozing from it's severed stem. Suddenly the whole thing fades away and you're left in a barren wasteland again.

You can't fight it anymore and pass out. When you open your eyes you see that you're in the next level which is..
1553322221222111.title: vs Biollante

info.brief_description: You are a typical Bully and now, the table has turned!
info.description:
Your name is Steven and is a sophomore at Bluemeadow High. You stand at 6'2'' and you work out regulary to keep fit. You are one of those bullies who like to pick on people to make them do things they don't want to do. You have brown hair and blue eyes and are actually quite handsome if not for your personality. Your story starts when you had a dream of some Goddess.

Some of the people that you know are:

Coral
She's a blonde cheerleader and also in your year. She's around 5'5'' and has nice slender body and honey coloured skin. Whenever you go past her, you brush yourself against her tits, annoying her to no end. One time, she even reported you for assaulting her sexually except it got no where because the teachers don't really like to be involved with you.

Ruby
She's a freshmen and around 5'6'' tall.She's your half-sister, having the same father although you don't live with her. She's got an alright figure and whenever you see her, it seems that she's quite popular because there are boys and girls following you around. It's rare to see her without Jade.

Sally
She's a year older than you and is one of your fellow bully. She's quite a tomboy and she has red hair flowing down to her shoulders. She's almost as tall as you at 6' and it's obvious from being around her, that she doesn't wash too often.

Trinity
She's your girlfriend and she's a brunette. She's quite small and is only 5'1'' but she makes up for it with her smooth tanned skin and kinkyness. She's pretty horny for you and has many friends. It is known throughout the school that she is quite slutty.

Joe
He's also in your year and he's what you would call a nerd. He has brown hair and he's around 5'4''. He gets good grades but doesn't play any sports. You and your friends like to bully him into doing your homework for you.

Mrs. Smith
She's your homeroom teacher. She's quite wild and she wears clothes that almost asks boys to touch her. To make the matter worse, she's only 25 she was a cheerleader when she was in high school, so she's very thin and has nice ass. She's around 5'8'' and has black hair. You and her have an odd relationship where you guys are always arguing in class. But if you look at it from a different angle, it's almost as Mrs. Smith actually enjoys talking to you.

Jade
Ruby's best friend. They are in the same year of course. You know Jade quite well because Ruby and Jade are always together in school. Jade is hispanic and her chest is quite filled out. She's the same height as Ruby and she might have the hots for you because more often than not, she blushes when she greets you.

Stephanie
She's a freshmen who's quite shy. She wears glasses and has quite a good figure. However, she tends to read books all the time, which isn't your type. She's bullied by you, Ruby and Jade all the time because she stands out as a geek. She's 5'3'' with orange hair.



The Goddess of Fairness

Whoever she is, she caused all this. She decided to punish you after watching your behaviour where you bullied and made fun of a lot of people. She can transform and change size as she wishes and she has a glowing aura about her. She enjoys tormenting you.


Rules:
Correct Grammar and Spelling
No chapters that are shorter than 3 lines

I'm mainly writing this to get my other stories noticed as well because they are pretty much dead as the only ones adding to them are me.


Have fun reading and Add if you wish.
